text: Nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, gu Fhe Bakɨme fhura nzan kora muuŋgi kora muumbara bakɨme nzuav khaŋ tɨga havhargiap nde nzuai. Nde won fhavi ndiv Fhe Bakɨmen nɨɨŋv, ana nzuav ofa mbui tɨvar muuŋgiri. Nde maaŋ muuŋgip, nde ntige ŋamra kɨv, nde Fhe Bakɨmen gumgi gu mbigir ŋaari kɨri. Nde anan gumgi gu mbigi kɨv, nde ana vuzvugi tɨvi, nde ntan muuŋri. Nde maaŋ muunga, nde guigira Fhe Bakɨmen rotur muunga.
